summary: Tricky one for you: If you had to choose who do you stan more, Josh or Luke? and why
question: Tricky one for you: If you had to choose who do you stan more, Josh or Luke? and why
answer: Low-key I don’t really stan the actors lol. I mean they’re a couple years younger than I am. I follow them to keep tabs on filming schedules and episode leaks, but I’m not super knowledgable past that. I do follow Josh for a few things outside of AM tho. I’m still a little iffy on all his ideas since he’s young but for the most part I agree with his politics and i love how vocal and expressive he is of everything, regardless. So if there is one actor i stan from the cast, it’s Josh. For his activism and support, even tho he’s a little messy.

question: Fav Ambi Headcanons?
answer:
they love ferris wheels

amber loves to win stuff animals for her datefriend

andi much rather check out all the booths and is casually snacking in the background while amber is playing some game

they go on carnival double dates with all their friends. those get CRAZY. 

amber loves practicing makeup on andi. andi doesn’t mind and really likes seeing all the different looks that amber comes up with.

blog.name: libbybeck
blog.title: nb edit witch
blog.description: kai //bi/ they/them //header by spidaerman.

question: Fav Ambi headcanons?
answer:
so i managed to get three ask of this question so i’ll say a few on each one,

andi’s always making amber flower crowns, 

amber tries to make one for andi but it ends up being lopsided and some petals have fallen off. amber’s trying to fix it when andi finds it, and amber’s like “NO. IT ISN’T FINISHED YET”. and andi’s like “I LOVE IT.” and goes on about how it’s nice to see a flower crown that isn’t all cutesy and feels real and since it was made by amber it’s already 100 % better than the ones andi has. they always wear this flower crown and andi’s so proud of the one from amber, no matter how many weird looks she gets. 

andi’s favorite flower is cherry blossoms so paints a small landscape of this cherry blossom tree andi’s always talking about wanting to see. amber also puts it in her book of places for her and andi to visit once they finish college.

Y'all this was such a heartwarming post to make
Feel free to add any I missed people
summary: Missing Tyrus Scenes That Live On In Our Hearts (And Blessed Fanfics): 1) T.J. swooping in to help loosen a cider bottle for...
body:
Missing Tyrus Scenes That Live On In Our Hearts (And Blessed Fanfics):

1) T.J. swooping in to help loosen a cider bottle for Cyrus at his “Bash-Mitzvah”. Slinking away unnoticed. Watching from the crowd with a fond smile, as Cyrus pops the bottle himself and gets swarmed by his friends and loved ones.

2) T.J. sprinting through the bustling school, weaving through students towards Cyrus, to show him the first C he earned on a math test. Cue the excited and wholehearted congratulations followed by a flustered hug.

3) Cyrus and T.J. hanging posters for Buffy’s tryouts. Casual conversations, and stolen glances. Just the two of them and their voices echoing down the empty school corridors.

4) Cyrus baking the specialty muffins from their bet and giving them to T.J.. Instantly rendering him a blushing mess because Cyrus obviously put a lot of work into these. Just for him.

Concerning the Cider scene: The only individual T.J. knew at this event, in a positive light, was the host himself who gave him a personal invite. There was a whole scene emphasizing this invitation, and we never got to see them interact at the actual party? Hmmm. Never gonna be over how odd that gap felt!

2) T.J. sprinting through the bustling school, weaving through students towards Cyrus, to show him the first C he earned on a math test. Cue the excited and wholehearted congratulations followed by a flustered hug.

3) Cyrus and T.J. hanging posters for Buffy’s tryouts. Casual conversations, and stolen glances. Just the two of them and their voices echoing down the empty school corridors.

4) Cyrus baking the specialty muffins from their bet and giving them to T.J.. Instantly rendering him a blushing mess because Cyrus obviously put a lot of work into these. Just for him.

Concerning the Cider scene: The only individual T.J. knew at this event, in a positive light, was the host himself who gave him a personal invite. There was a whole scene emphasizing this invitation, and we never got to see them interact at the actual party? Hmmm. Never gonna be over how odd that gap felt!
